item.title: cli cheatsheet
tool cheatsheet
item.description: manual tool platform tool Windows Zeal Mac OS X Dash cli tool name usage cppman look up cpp function Ncdu disk usage analyzer dstat bettern vmstat substitute ShellCheck a static analysis tool for shell scripts Pathpicker / fpp selecting files out of bash output tmuxp save and import tmux session python plot lib matplotlib pandas seaborn Bokeh python cli tool name usage fire change python script to a cmd glances
